habit.text: Complete Positive Habits to earn gold and experience! Negative Habits will hurt your avatar if you tap them. Try to only do Positive Habits in real life!

daily.text: Danger! These repeating tasks will hurt your avatar if you don't complete them in time. When you complete them, you'll gain gold and experience. Level up to heal!

todo.text: When you defeat your To-Dos by completing them in real life, your avatar will earn GOLD that can be used to buy Rewards [point at Rewards], and EXPERIENCE. Add some now!

reward.text: These are your Rewards! Earn gold by completing real-world Habits, Dailies, and To-Dos. Then spend it on in-game rewards or custom real-world rewards!

party.text: This is where you and your friends can hold each other accountable to your goals and fight monsters with your tasks!
